Description.div:
A combination of OrganizationCode and InventoryMonitorRule can be used to indentify an inventory monitor rule to be created or modified.
OrganizationCode and InventoryMonitorRule are not passed.
If level quantities are not in the order of minimum to maximum from level 3, level 2, to level 1 respectively.

Attribute.Name: InventoryMonitorRuleType
Attribute.Description:
The type of the inventory monitor rule. Default value: ACTION. Values:
EVENT - used for the event based monitor.
ACTION - Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by EVENT. used for the action based monitor.
